name: Chambers (ventedpennies)
description:
Description

Four players enter the chamber with a bomb strapped to them, only one can make it out alive. You can grab powerups to help you and slap the other players around, but can you outwit and out-slap your opponents? Good luck. 

I made this game for my 1gam challenge for the month of May, 2018.  I was the solo developer and used some free art assets available at opengameart.com and the Unity Asset Store. 

Controls are detailed in the game. This is a local multiplayer game, so you can either have 2 people on the keyboard and 2 people with gamepads or all 4 people on gamepads. 

There is a WebGL version and a Windows version. "Escape" key brings up the pause menu. 

Please let me know what you think. This game was inspired by an old childhood favorite of mine. Can you guess which one?
